docblock.description: Simple autoloader that follow the PHP Standards Recommendation #0 (PSR-0)

tag.name: see
tag.description:
for more informations.
Code inspired from the SplClassLoader RFC

docblock.description: The Redbooth API low-level HTTP Layer.

docblock.long-description: Build an endpoint URL by concatenating the base URL, the API path and the given method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method that you want to call.

docblock.long-description: Perform a GET request to a given API method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method that you want to call.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the response.

docblock.long-description: Perform a POST request to a given API method.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method that you want to call.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the response.

docblock.long-description: A variation of the post() method that handles a file upload by setting the appropriate MIME type.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method that you want to call.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The complete path of the file you want to upload.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the file you're uploading. Defaults to 'asset'.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the response.

docblock.long-description: The constructor receives information needed to interact with the OAuth2 API and sets local class attributes.
Changes the headers array by adding an OAuth2 Bearer Authorization header.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The original headers array. If empty a new array will be created.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A headers array including the authorization header.

docblock.description: Throw an exception if a refresh token is invalid.
Refresh the OAuth2 access and refresh tokens.
docblock.long-description: Make a request to the API and refresh the OAuth2 access and refresh tokens. Throw an invalid token exception if, during the call, any of the tokens is not valid.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object with information about the new tokens.

Argument $method is missing from the Docblock of get
Argument $method is missing from the Docblock of post
Argument $method is missing from the Docblock of postFile

docblock.long-description: Exception thrown when any of the OAuth2 tokens is considered invalid, e.g. expired access or refresh token.
Exception thrown when an API method is not found.

docblock.description: The Redbooth API low-level OAuth2 Utilities.

docblock.long-description: The constructor receives information needed to interact with the OAuth2 API and sets local class attributes.
Changes the headers array by adding an OAuth2 Bearer Authorization header.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The original headers array. If empty a new array will be created.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A headers array including the authorization header.

docblock.description: Throw an exception if a refresh token is invalid.
Refresh the OAuth2 access and refresh tokens.
docblock.long-description: Make a request to the API and refresh the OAuth2 access and refresh tokens. Throw an invalid token exception if, during the call, any of the tokens is not valid.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object with information about the new tokens.

parse_markers.error: Argument $clientId is missing from the Docblock of __construct
Argument $headers is missing from the Docblock of addAuthorizationHeader
Argument $res is missing from the Docblock of throwIfTokenInvalid

docblock.long-description: Some methods, specifically getters are implemented using the __call() magic method.

Magic method used to overload methods specified on the $listGetters attribute.
Available methods include: * `object getActivities()` Get a list of activities. * `object getComments()` Get a list of comments. * `object getConversations()` Get a list of conversations. * `object getMemberships()` Get a list of memberships. * `object getNotes()` Get a list of notes. * `object getNotifications()` Get a list of notifications. * `object getOrganizations()` Get a list of organizations. * `object getPeople()` Get a list of people. * `object getProjects()` Get a list of projects. * `object getSubtasks()` Get a list of subtasks. * `object getTaskLists()` Get a list of task lists. * `object getTasks()` Get a list of tasks. * `object getUsers()` Get a list of users. * `object getFiles()` Get a list of files.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the method being called.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list of arguments passed to the method.

docblock.long-description: Get information from a single file available to the user through the API.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the file to get.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the file information.

docblock.long-description: Download a file given its ID and obtain it as specified by the filename parameter.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the file to download.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The contents of the downloaded file.

docblock.description: Get information about a particular user.
docblock.long-description: Get all the available information about the user identified by a given ID.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the user to read.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the user.

docblock.description: Get information about the authorized user.
docblock.long-description: Get all the available information about the user currently authorized, i.e. me.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the user.

docblock.long-description: Create a new conversation inside a specific project with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the project where you want to create the conversation.

tag.name: param
tag.description: You can optionally set the conversation body.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the conversation is private. Defaults to false.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the created conversation.

docblock.long-description: Create a new task inside a specific project and a specific task list with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the project where you want to create the task.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the task list where you want to create the task.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the task is private. Defaults to false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The status of the task. Can be new, open, hold, resolved or rejected. Defaults to open.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representing the created task.

docblock.long-description: Create a new subtask inside a specific task with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the task where you want to create the subtask.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the subtask is resolved. Defaults to false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ordinal position of the subtask on the list.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representing the created subtask.

docblock.long-description: Create a new task list inside a specific project with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the project where you want to create the task list.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the task list is archived. Defaults to false.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the created task list.

docblock.long-description: Create a new note inside a specific project with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the project where you want to create the note.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the note is private. Defaults to false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether or not the note is shared. Defaults to false.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the created note.

docblock.long-description: Create a new comment on a specific target with all the information passed by the parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of target where the comment will be created. Can be conversation or task.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID of the target where the comment will be created.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Optionally set the spent time on a task.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Optionally add the date when time tracking was turned on.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An object representation of the created comment.

docblock.description: Get a list of task lists.

tag.name: method
tag.description: Get a list of task lists.
